name: Mohammad Hewedy
summary:
A confident, self-motivated software architect with more than 11 years of experience in software development and architecture. A deep researcher and a passionate learner in every aspect of his life, with good analytical and verbal skills.

Contributed to a number of Open Source projects including Spring AMQP, Spring Data JPA, RabbitMQ Hop and castlemock.
Knowlege and experience in may programming Languages and ecosystems including Java, Kotlin, Scala, Groovy, Golang, C, Objective-C, Ruby(Rails, Sinatra), JavaScript, TypeScript, C# and others (see github)
